entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is a person who has a conversation with Harry about Sirius Black. He mentions that wizards can leave an imprint of themselves upon the earth (Excerpt: 'Wizards can leave an imprint of themselves upon the earth...').

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has a conversation with Nick about Sirius Black. He believes that Sirius will come back (Excerpt: 'Anyway — it doesn’t matter — Sirius won’t care if it’s unusual, he’ll come back, I know he will!').

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person who has died and left an imprint of himself upon the earth. Nick mentions that Sirius won't come back (Excerpt: 'He won’t come back').

relationships.description: Nick mentions that Sirius Black has left an imprint of himself upon the earth (Excerpt: 'Wizards can leave an imprint of themselves upon the earth...').
Harry believes that Sirius Black will come back (Excerpt: 'Anyway — it doesn’t matter — Sirius won’t care if it’s unusual, he’ll come back, I know he will!').
Nick mentions that Sirius Black has died (Excerpt: 'He won’t come back').
